kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=shopick_v2, user=qa, passwd=DWkg8yNJjZMYFwgd, host=34.68.209.108, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Check Member id Present in Master_Member Table
Check If Exists In Database
kw.arg: select member_id from shopick_v2.master_member where member_id='${memberId}';
kw.doc: Check if any row would be returned by given the input `selectStatement`. If there are no results, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Check If Exists In Database | select member_id from shopick_v2.master_member where member_id='076811a1-dcf1-11eb-bce9-42010a715007';
Executing : Query | select member_id from shopick_v2.master_member where member_id='076811a1-dcf1-11eb-bce9-42010a715007';
